enhanced_by.method_name: intersects(double, double, double, double, double, double, double, double)
enhanced_by.reason: The intersects method is called within the distance method to determine if the points intersect, which is a prerequisite for the distance calculation.
The distanceSquared method is used to calculate the squared distance, which is a fundamental part of the distance calculation.
Both methods involve geometric calculations related to distances and intersections, which can inform the construction of assertions for the distance method.
The max method is used within the distance method to handle edge cases, which can inform the construction of assertions for boundary conditions.
